description: President Trump said at a rally on Saturday in West Virginia that North Korea’s leader, Kim Jong-un, wrote him “beautiful letters” and they “fell in love.”
title: Trump on Kim Jong-un: ‘We Fell in Love’
title_page: Trump on Kim Jong-un: ‘We Fell in Love’ - The New York Times
maintext: We were going to war with North Korea. That was what was going to happen. Millions of people would have been killed. I came in and took a very hard position. Very hard position. And you know what? Now we have this great relationship. And let’s see what happens. I was really being tough and so was he. And we were going back and forth. And then we fell in love, O.K.? No, really. He wrote me beautiful letters, and they’re great letters. We fell in love.
